name: Taco Salad Pizza
author: My Hot Southern Mess
summary: When you can't decide between pizza and tacos, make both! Save time by starting with a pre-made frozen CAULIPOWER® crust.
ingredients: ½ cup black beans, rinsed and drained
¼ cup shredded pepper Jack cheese
directions: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Spray a skillet with cooking spray
Cook ground beef on medium-high heat until browned, 5 to 7 minutes
Add black beans, water, salsa, and   and cook for about 2 minutes more
Unwrap pizza and place on a baking sheet
Spread meat and bean mixture evenly over the crust
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 12 minutes
While pizza is baking, combine sour cream and hot sauce in a small bowl
Transfer to a small zip-top bag and place in the refrigerator
Allow pizza to cool for about 5 minutes, then top with lettuce, tomato, jalapeno, cilantro, and tortilla strips
Snip off a corner of the zip-top bag and drizzle the sour cream and hot sauce mixture over the pizza
